title: Simple Image Upload App
description: One of common tasks that we need to solve as developer is working with files. In this challenge, you need to create a simple Image Upload application.

userStories.content: Create a simple image upload application following given design.
Users can upload an image at a time. The file should be JPG, PNG or GIF, the maximun size is 2MB.
Users can drag and drop the file to upload it.
Users can browse files and select a file to upload.
When the image is uploading, users can see an loader like in the design.
When the image is successfully uploaded, users can see the image.
After image is uploaded, users can copy its address by selecting `Share` button
After image is uploaded, users can download the image by selecting `Download` button
Optional, users change theme between dark and light.
Deploy the solution and submit Repository URL and Demo URL.

text.content: Drag & drop a file or browse files
JPG, PNG or GIF - Max file size 2MB
